scripts.webos:emu: npm run build && ares-package build service && ares-install -d emulator --remove com.willinux.tvh.app && ares-install com.willinux.tvh.app_1.0.0_all.ipk -d emulator && ares-launch com.willinux.tvh.app -d emulator
scripts.webos:tv: npm run build && ares-package build service && ares-install -d tv --remove com.willinux.tvh.app && ares-install com.willinux.tvh.app_1.0.0_all.ipk -d tv && ares-launch com.willinux.tvh.app -d tv
